licenseNumber.title: Driver's license number
licenseNumber.description: The person's driver's license number. Only applicable for a `ClaimContact` that represents a person.

licenseState.title: Driver's license state
licenseState.description: The person's driver's license state. Only applicable for a `ClaimContact` that represents a person.

RUNumber.title: Risk unit number
RUNumber.description: The number automatically assigned to this covered risk unit on the policy

coverages.title: Coverages
coverages.description: The list of coverages that apply to this risk unit

description.title: Description
description.description: A description of the risk unit

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of this element

policySystemId.title: Policy system ID
policySystemId.description: The unique identifier of this element within the policy system

vehicle.title: Vehicle
vehicle.description: Details of the vehicle that is covered

vehicleId.title: Vehicle ID
vehicleId.description: The unique identifier of the `Vehicle` that is covered

vehicleLocation.title: Vehicle location
vehicleLocation.description: A reference to the `PolicyLocation` that the vehicle is associated with
